title: Root x Shaw || Sucker for pain [Person of Interest]
author: SnowFalls3
comment: When the fck did this vid get more than 1.7million views??? Wow, thanks? Wow!
What are these two women ? passion , love, protection , obsession ... they are all together !!thanks for this video :)
I am so thankful for shoot as a pairing. they are so unique. and perfect for each other. i need a spinoff!

The first time I listened to this song I thought that it was made for root and shaw and actually I wanted to do a video myself lol but this is perfect and I will watch it again and again for the next few days!
description:
I just... I don't have an explanation for you guys. I opened vegas tonight and an hour later this happened.

To all the 3 people who will actually watch this: i'm sorry and just know I couldn't help myself. This song just fcking fits them alright

I miss Root and Shaw to no end 
THIS IS WHAT HAPPENS WHEN I HAVE OTP WITHDRAWAL


i'll see myself out now....

(....and I'll try to upload something less trashy but I'm still at the bottom of the Shoot pit and I can't get out help me)

Show: Person of Interest
